source_company_business_description: Merec Industries, SA was founded in 1998, and is actually a national reference in Maize and wheat flours, pastas, biscuits and animal feeds. We have 4 manufacture units, 2 in Matola, 1 in Beira and other in Nacala. Our products have high quality and can be found in all Mozambican
source_company_specialties: Moagem, Soluções Agrárias, Rações, Farinhas, Massas, and Bolachas
